tasks.title: Do the weekly grocery shopping
tasks.description: Buy necessary food and products for the week. Review the shopping list and ensure all basic items are included.

tasks.title: Take out the trash
tasks.description: Collect the trash from all bins in the house and take it to the appropriate outdoor container.

tasks.title: Clean the kitchen
tasks.description: Clean all surfaces in the kitchen, including countertops, sink, and appliances. Sweep and mop the floor.

tasks.title: Do the course exercise
tasks.description: Do the exercise app with the Open Cells framework
